definition: a small illustrative sketch, as sometimes placed at the beginning of chapters in books
details:
noun
- a small illustrative sketch, as sometimes placed at the beginning of chapters in books
= example: a small illustrative sketch, as sometimes placed at the beginning of chapters in books
- a photograph whose edges shade off gradually
= example: a photograph whose edges shade off gradually
- a brief literary description
= example: a brief literary description
= synonyms: sketch
